{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":182991,"originalJapaneseLine":"　色々と苦労をさせられると思うが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I think you'll have to go through a lot of hardships...\""},{"lineNumber":182992,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ばーか、変な勘違いをするな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Idiot, don't get the wrong idea."},{"lineNumber":182993,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺があいつの物になったんじゃない」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm not the one who became hers."},{"lineNumber":182994,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいつが今から俺のものになるんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"She's the one who's going to be mine from now on."},{"lineNumber":182995,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hmm.\""},{"lineNumber":182996,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっはっはっはっはっはっ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahaha ha ha ha ha!"},{"lineNumber":182997,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ああ、うむ、それならそれでいい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, yes, if that's the case then that's fine!\""},{"lineNumber":182998,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ、せいぜい癇癪だけは","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, just be careful not to throw tantrums too much."},{"lineNumber":182999,"originalJapaneseLine":"　起こさせないよう気をつけておけ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Make sure she doesn't get one."},{"lineNumber":183000,"originalJapaneseLine":"　余も回復魔法のたぐいは不得手だからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm not good with healing magic myself.\""},{"lineNumber":183001,"originalJapaneseLine":"「物騒なこと言いおって」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You say dangerous things.\""},{"lineNumber":183002,"originalJapaneseLine":"「〜♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"~♪\""},{"lineNumber":183003,"originalJapaneseLine":"「サテラ様、ゴ機嫌デスネ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lady Satella, you're in a great mood.\""},{"lineNumber":183004,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふん、そんなことはない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, that's not true."},{"lineNumber":183005,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いつも通りだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's just as usual.\""},{"lineNumber":183006,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラは上機嫌でシーザーの肩に乗っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella was in high spirits, sitting on Caesar's shoulder."},{"lineNumber":183007,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あら？　ランス様、アレ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, oh? Lord Rance, that...\""},{"lineNumber":183008,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へへ、客が来たな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, we've got visitors.\""},{"lineNumber":183009,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わっ、悪魔ですよ、ランス様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wah, it's a devil, Lord Rance!\""},{"lineNumber":183010,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この道は通せんぼだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This path is blocked."},{"lineNumber":183011,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここを通りたくば魂の契約をしてもらう！」","translatedEnglishLine":"If you want to pass, you must make a contract for your soul!\""},{"lineNumber":183012,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魂の契約？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A soul contract?\""},{"lineNumber":183013,"originalJapaneseLine":"「願い三つ叶える変わりに、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In exchange for granting three wishes,"},{"lineNumber":183014,"originalJapaneseLine":"　死後の魂をもらうって契約だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"they take your soul after death—that's the contract.\""},{"lineNumber":183015,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、悪魔お馴染みのアレか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, that's the usual devil stuff.\""},{"lineNumber":183016,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いらん、帰れ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No thanks, go away.\""},{"lineNumber":183017,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むう、悪魔相手にちっとも動じないとは、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, to not be fazed at all by a devil,"},{"lineNumber":183018,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なかなかの男伊達-ｵﾄｺﾀﾞﾃ-……」","translatedEnglishLine":"you truly are a fine man...\""},{"lineNumber":183019,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが、こっちも商売でな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But this is business for me too."},{"lineNumber":183020,"originalJapaneseLine":"　契約してくれるまでこの道は通らせないぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I won't let you pass until you make a contract.\""},{"lineNumber":183021,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだとぉ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What did you say?"},{"lineNumber":183022,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魂のカツアゲなんて初めて聞いたぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I've never heard of a soul extortion before!\""},{"lineNumber":183023,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ハッキリ言って俺はとっても強いぞぉ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To be clear, I'm very strong."},{"lineNumber":183024,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦うなんて無益なことせず契約した方がいいぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's better not to waste time fighting and just make a contract.\""},{"lineNumber":183025,"originalJapaneseLine":"「というわけで、契約しようぜ、契約」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, let's make a contract, a contract.\""},{"lineNumber":183026,"originalJapaneseLine":"（うーん、癪だが確かに","translatedEnglishLine":"(Hmm, it's annoying but certainly"},{"lineNumber":183027,"originalJapaneseLine":"　倒そうと思ったら時間のかかりそうな敵だ）","translatedEnglishLine":"this enemy would take a lot of time to defeat.)"},{"lineNumber":183028,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちっ、面倒だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, this is troublesome."},{"lineNumber":183029,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おい、シィル、なんかこの道を通る策考えろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, Sil, think of a way to get through this path.\""},{"lineNumber":183030,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ、わ、私ですか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, m-me?\""},{"lineNumber":183031,"originalJapaneseLine":"「早くしろ。早くしないと叩く。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hurry up. If you don't, I'll hit you."},{"lineNumber":183032,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ごー、よーん、さーん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Go — four — three...\""},{"lineNumber":183033,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーん、うーん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Umm, umm."},{"lineNumber":183034,"originalJapaneseLine":"　と、突然言われても……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Being told this suddenly...\""},{"lineNumber":183035,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんかあるだろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"There must be something."},{"lineNumber":183036,"originalJapaneseLine":"　同じ悪魔のフェリスに説得させるとか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Like having the same devil, Felis, persuade them."},{"lineNumber":183037,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、フェリスさんですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, Felis-san?\""},{"lineNumber":183038,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………あ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Ah.\""},{"lineNumber":183039,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら？　でも今は彼女、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh? But she is currently,"},{"lineNumber":183040,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス城で療養中の筈じゃ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"supposed to be recuperating at Rance Castle...\""},{"lineNumber":183041,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、それが、元気になったので","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, well, she got better,"},{"lineNumber":183042,"originalJapaneseLine":"　また一緒に戦って下さることに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"so she's agreed to fight alongside us again...\""},{"lineNumber":183043,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………う、うむ、まあな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Y-yeah, well.\""},{"lineNumber":183044,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":183045,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":183046,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがフェリスの部屋を訪ねていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance visited Felis' room."},{"lineNumber":183047,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おーう、入るぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, I'm coming in!\""},

{"lineNumber":183048,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、あ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, ah...\""},

{"lineNumber":183049,"originalJapaneseLine":"突然の闖入者であるランスに向けて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Felis turned her weary eyes towards Rance, the sudden intruder."},

{"lineNumber":183050,"originalJapaneseLine":"フェリスが気だるげに目を向けた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Felis gave a tired look."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 色々と苦労をさせられると思うが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I think you'll have to go through a lot of hardships..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ばーか、変な勘違いをするな。
俺があいつの物になったんじゃない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not the one who became hers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あいつが今から俺のものになるんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's the one who's going to be mine from now on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっはっはっはっはっはっ！
ああ、うむ、それならそれでいい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, yes, if that's the case then that's fine!"
Well, just be careful not to throw tantrums too much.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 起こさせないよう気をつけておけ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make sure she doesn't get one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 余も回復魔法のたぐいは不得手だからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not good with healing magic myself."
"Lady Satella, you're in a great mood."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラは上機嫌でシーザーの肩に乗っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella was in high spirits, sitting on Caesar's shoulder.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここを通りたくば魂の契約をしてもらう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you want to pass, you must make a contract for your soul!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死後の魂をもらうって契約だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they take your soul after death—that's the contract."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、悪魔お馴染みのアレか」
「むう、悪魔相手にちっとも動じないとは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, to not be fazed at all by a devil,
you truly are a fine man..."
"But this is business for me too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 契約してくれるまでこの道は通らせないぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't let you pass until you make a contract."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魂のカツアゲなんて初めて聞いたぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've never heard of a soul extortion before!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハッキリ言って俺はとっても強いぞぉ。
戦うなんて無益なことせず契約した方がいいぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's better not to waste time fighting and just make a contract."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで、契約しようぜ、契約」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, let's make a contract, a contract."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒そうと思ったら時間のかかりそうな敵だ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this enemy would take a lot of time to defeat.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、シィル、なんかこの道を通る策考えろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, Sil, think of a way to get through this path."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「早くしろ。早くしないと叩く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hurry up. If you don't, I'll hit you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 同じ悪魔のフェリスに説得させるとか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like having the same devil, Felis, persuade them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城で療養中の筈じゃ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: supposed to be recuperating at Rance Castle..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、それが、元気になったので
また一緒に戦って下さることに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so she's agreed to fight alongside us again..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがフェリスの部屋を訪ねていた。
突然の闖入者であるランスに向けて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Felis turned her weary eyes towards Rance, the sudden intruder.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フェリスが気だるげに目を向けた。

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
